relevant_findings: Echocardiogram demonstrated a trileaflet aortic valve with trace aortic insufficiency and a left ventricular ejection fraction of 62%.
Computed tomography angiogram revealed a 37 mm aortic root and 38 mm ascending aorta.
Intraoperative finding of an extremely thin aortic wall (1 mm) and a fragile aorta.
Distal ascending aortic wall was about 2 mm thick.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient has been doing well for >1 year with a competent aortic valve since her operation.
